value:
This castle has been built with
excellent defense in mind. It will
rebuff foes more easily. Admirable.

Where I'm from, women are rarely the
kind of knights who wear heavy armor.
But I want to be like my dear brother.

I admire how seriously you take these
patrols of yours. I'd accompany you,
but I fear that I'd slow you down.

Between you and me, this armor is
simply murder on my back!

Wearing heavy armor like this takes
daily practice. It's harder than you
think, just walking around.

I've come a long way to bid you
hello, $Nu.$k$pOh, not from me personally. I bring
greetings from your good friend
$Nf.

Such power! Now you can
really rely on me!

As expected for a knight of
Ostia.

I mustn't be a burden on
others...

I never imagined I could get this
strong!

I'm Gwendolyn, one of the knights of
Ostia. Some say I wear this armor as a
sort of spectacle. They're quite wrong.

I've got to say that I appreciate
all of your guidance in battle.$k$pBut sometimes I worry that you
try to protect me too much out there.$k$pAm I failing to do my part as a knight,
protecting others, if you're always
worried about my safety?$k$pMaybe you think that I draw too
much attention to myself by wearing
such colorful armor.$k$pBut that's exactly why I do wear
this—to draw foes to me and
away from others!$k$pI know that we need to act as a
team out there, but my role really is
to put myself in harm's way!$k$pStill, thank you. I'll always have the
courage to protect everyone, knowing
that you're looking out for me.
えいっ！
はぁっ！
きゃああっ！
I can't...be a burden...
I refuse to lose!
A knight must never fall!
With all my might!
And now, my turn!
Sorry...
Heehee
Oh MY! Whew...what a surprise. Next time, maybe just say hi.
Please don't let me fall over in this armor. It'd be impossible to get up again.
A truly loyal knight is ever glad to bear the heaviest of armor.
This armor adds a tremendous amount of bulk! Really, you wouldn't believe it.
I offer my gratitude for your kindness and your consideration.
One, TWO! And one, TWO! Whew!
I give you my solemn vow—to defend you, even at the cost of my life.
Yes?
Certainly.
My turn?
